name: cobby/webhook-plugin
description: Shopware 6 Plugin for Queue-Only Architecture - Tracks entity changes in queue for Cobby Automate

description.de-DE: Cobby Plugin für Shopware 6: Erfasst alle Entity-Änderungen (Produkte, Kategorien, Eigenschaften) in einer Queue für die nahtlose Integration mit Cobby Automate PIM.
description.en-GB: Cobby Plugin for Shopware 6: Tracks all entity changes (products, categories, properties) in a queue for seamless integration with Cobby Automate PIM system.
